lore: One autumn morning, a boy from Andolin drew a creature. A being who would protect the people of the world from the evils that plagued them no matter what happened. His mother, a professor at the Magic University of that kingdom, took the drawing with her to her office. After a few days her secretary, a young Raven, misplaced the drawing, which ended up next to a pile of scrolls on which a ritual was to be performed. The result was a creature that would not let anything or anyone pollute the various ecosystems found in Andolin.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Rhozzgon
